cycle.note: BOOT SEQUENCE INITIATED. Two WATCHERS deployed. They see you. They drift. They remember. The dungeon observes its first prisoner. #Cycle1 #TheWatchersAwaken
HOSTILE RESPONSE DETECTED. Prisoner now weaponized. Projectile manifestation capability granted. WASD to move. IJKL to fire. The Watchers are no longer safe. #Cycle2 #ArmedAndDangerous
